product_name: The North Face Litho Wool T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made with soft merino wool, the women's Litho top from The North Face is comfortable for layering in cool weather or wearing on its own when it warms up. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying merino wool fabric naturally resists odors. Move freely thanks to an athletically patterned design that's meant to enhance motion. Easy-to-access, zippered side-seam pocket stores small items. The North Face Litho top for women offers an athletic, close-fitting cut to enhance warmth without inhibiting movement.
short_description: Made with soft merino wool, the women's Litho top from The North Face is comfortable for layering in cool weather or wearing on its own when it warms up.
